effect.en: Search your discard pile for a Supporter card and use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack. (The Supporter card remains in your discard pile.)
Choose 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokémon. This attack’s damage isn’t affected by Weakness or Resistance.

description.en: It is highly perceptive of its Trainer’s feelings. It dances when it is feeling happy.
